statements: SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM research_grants WHERE grant_id = 1;
SELECT grant_description FROM research_grants WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_grants WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_description FROM research_grants WHERE grant_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_grants WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM research_grants WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT grant_title FROM research_grants WHERE grant_description ILIKE '%research%' AND grant_amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 10000;
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_grants ORDER BY grant_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT grant_title, grant_description FROM research_grants WHERE grant_description IS NOT NULL AND grant_title LIKE 'Research%';
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, grant_amount FROM research_grants;
SELECT * FROM research_grants;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount, grant_status FROM research_grants WHERE grant_status='Approved';
SELECT grant_title, grant_deadline FROM research_grants ORDER BY grant_deadline DESC;
SELECT funding_source, funding_amount FROM funding_information WHERE funding_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM research_grants WHERE grant_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM funding_information WHERE funding_amount > 5000 ORDER BY funding_date DESC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount, grant_deadline FROM research_grants ORDER BY grant_deadline ASC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount, funding_source, funding_amount FROM research_grants INNER JOIN funding_information ON research_grants.grant_id = funding_information.grant_id;
SELECT grant_title, funding_source, funding_amount FROM research_grants LEFT JOIN funding_information ON research_grants.grant_id = funding_information.grant_id;
SELECT * FROM research_grants;
SELECT grant_title, researcher_name FROM research_grants WHERE funding_amount > 5000;
SELECT researcher_name, grant_title, funding_amount FROM research_grants ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_grants WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT grant_id, grant_title, researcher_name, funding_amount FROM research_grants WHERE funding_amount < 10000;
SELECT grant_title, researcher_name, funding_amount FROM research_grants WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_title, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_grants WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT researcher_name, grant_title, funding_sources.source_name, email_address FROM research_grants INNER JOIN funding_sources ON research_grants.grant_id = funding_sources.source_id WHERE research_grants.grant_id = 1;
SELECT grant_title, researcher_name, grant_categories.category_name FROM research_grants LEFT JOIN grant_categories ON research_grants.grant_id = grant_categories.category_id;

SELECT researcher_name, grant_title, funding_amount, category_name FROM research_grants JOIN grant_categories ON research_grants.grant_id = grant_categories.category_id WHERE funding_amount > 5000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM grants
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_department FROM researchers
SELECT funding_name, funding_type, funding_amount FROM funding_sources
SELECT grant_title, grant_description FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_department = 'Computer Science'
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 10000 ORDER BY grant_title DESC;
SELECT grant_title, grant_description FROM grants JOIN grant_researcher_mapping ON grants.grant_id = grant_researcher_mapping.grant_id WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT funding_name, funding_amount FROM funding_sources WHERE funding_type = 'Research' ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;

SELECT researchers.researcher_name, grants.grant_title FROM researchers JOIN grant_researcher_mapping ON researchers.researcher_id = grant_researcher_mapping.researcher_id JOIN grants ON grant_researcher_mapping.grant_id = grants.grant_id;
SELECT grant_title, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_description LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_applications;
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT source_name, funding_type, amount_allocated FROM funding_sources WHERE funding_type = 'Government';
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, grant_amount, application_date FROM grant_applications;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name, affiliation FROM grant_reviewers WHERE reviewer_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT source_id, source_name, funding_type, amount_allocated FROM funding_sources WHERE amount_allocated > 10000;
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount_received) AS total_amount_received FROM project_funding GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_amount_received > 50000;
